channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Yellow line needs extending, 28th November
item.description:
Good morning. I have had to just choose option as I could not find the correct one and I have dyslexia. A new yellow line has been painted on Myrtle Close on the left hand side as the road slopes down. The line goes towards number 41 but stops too soon. Cars still keep parking on this corner as there is still enough room for a car to park as the line is not long enough.The bin lorries are unable to get down the road and there is no way a fire engine or ambulance would ever get through the gap. This yellow line needs to be extended towards the start of the drive on number 41. This would make sure no one could park on this corner. Please could this be looked at thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Myrtle Close, North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
